message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR 

This paper is about improving neural machine translation (NMT) systems, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a method to calculate the lexicon probability of the next word in the translation candidate, which involves using attention vectors and selecting source words, which suggests that the paper could also be classified under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper discusses experiments and results, which could place it under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper involves language modeling and information retrieval, which could classify it under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
